A B O U T







Hi there! I recently graduated from Carnegie Mellon University with a Bachelors of Science in Information Systems and minors in Human Computer Interaction and Business. I loved how interdisciplinary my studies are and the flexibility they gave me to pursue contrasting interests. I'm now at Deloitte working on digital projects as a UX designer. In my free time you can find me journaling, watching cat videos and experimenting with different design mediums. Feel free to contact me if you have any questions or want to chat!
